languages.text: {n}Губы эльдарки сжимаются тонкой нитью.{/n} "Увы, элантах. Как невозможно заставить воды реки обернуться вспять, так и мысли сего мон-кай не подчинить твоей воле. Не всегда способны речи свернуть горы и осушить море. Иногда... приходится обнажить клинки".

traits.locale_text: {n}Губы эльдарки сжимаются тонкой нитью.{/n} "Увы, элантах. Как невозможно заставить воды реки обернуться вспять, так и мысли сего мон-кай не подчинить твоей воле. Не всегда способны речи свернуть горы и осушить море. Иногда... приходится обнажить клинки".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backward. Words cannot always move the mountains and dry the seas. Sometimes... only blades can."
languages.original_text: {n}Губы эльдарки сжимаются тонкой нитью.{/n} "Увы, элантах. Как невозможно заставить воды реки обернуться вспять, так и мысли сего мон-кай не подчинить твоей воле. Не всегда способны речи свернуть горы и осушить море. Иногда... приходится обнажить клинки".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backwards. The words cannot always move the mountains and dry out the seas. Sometimes... you have to use force."

{n}The Aeldari presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backwards. The words cannot always move the mountains and dry out the seas. Sometimes... you have to use force."

{n}The Aeldari presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backward. The words cannot always move the mountains and dry out the seas. Sometimes... you have to use force."

{n}The Aeldari presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backward. The words cannot always move the mountains and dry out the seas. Sometimes... you have to use force."

{n}Yrliet presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backward. Words cannot always move the mountains and dry the seas. Sometimes... only blades can."

{n}Yrliet presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backward. Words cannot always move the mountains and dry the seas. Sometimes... only blades can."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet aprieta los labios.{/n} «Ay, elantach. No puedes controlar los pensamientos de este mon-keigh más de lo que podrías invertir el caudal de un río. Las palabras no siempre mueven montañas ni secan los océanos. A veces... no queda más remedio que emplear las armas».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backward. Words cannot always move the mountains and dry the seas. Sometimes... only blades can."

traits.locale_text: {n}La Aeldari aprieta los labios.{/n} «Ay, elantach. No puedes controlar los pensamientos de este mon-keigh más de lo que podrías invertir el caudal de un río. Las palabras no siempre mueven montañas ni secan los océanos. A veces... no queda más remedio que emplear la fuerza».

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特族将嘴唇紧抿成一条细线。{/n}“很遗憾，外界人。你无法控制这只猴子的思想，就像你无法让河水倒流一样。言语并非总是能移山竭海，有的时候……只能动用武力。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backward. Words cannot always move the mountains and dry the seas. Sometimes... only blades can."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特族将嘴唇紧抿成一条细线。{/n}“很遗憾，外界人。你无法控制这只猴子的思想，就像你无法让河水倒流一样。言语并非总是能移山竭海，有的时候……你只能动用武力。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet pince les lèvres.{/n} « Hélas, elantach, vous ne pouvez pas plus contrôler les pensées de ce mon-keigh que faire couler une rivière à l'envers. Les paroles ne peuvent pas toujours déplacer des montagnes ni assécher des mers. Parfois... il faut laisser parler les armes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backward. Words cannot always move the mountains and dry the seas. Sometimes... only blades can."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Aeldari pince les lèvres.{/n} « Hélas, elantach, vous ne pouvez pas plus contrôler les pensées de ce mon-keigh que faire couler une rivière à l'envers. Les paroles ne peuvent pas toujours déplacer des montagnes ni assécher des mers. Parfois... il faut avoir recours à la force. »

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは唇を押さえる。{/n}「残念だが、エランタ。川の流れを逆流させることができないように、このモン＝ケイの考えをコントロールすることはできない。言葉は山を動かすことも、海を干上がらせることもできないのだ。時には…剣を振るわなければならないこともある」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backward. Words cannot always move the mountains and dry the seas. Sometimes... only blades can."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは唇を押さえる。{/n}「残念だが、エランタ。川の流れを逆流させることができないように、このモン＝ケイの考えをコントロールすることはできない。言葉は山を動かすことも、海を干上がらせることもできないのだ。時には…剣を振るわなければならないこともある」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet presst die Lippen zu einem dünnen Strich zusammen.{/n} "Ach, ach, Elantach. Ihr könnt die Gedanken dieses Chem-Pan-Sey ebenso wenig kontrollieren, wie Ihr einen Fluss rückwärts fließen lassen könnt. Nicht immer können Worte Berge versetzen und Meere austrocknen. Manchmal ... können nur Klingen das."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backward. Words cannot always move the mountains and dry the seas. Sometimes... only blades can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aeldari presst die Lippen zu einem dünnen Strich zusammen.{/n} Ach, ach, Elantach. Ihr könnt die Gedanken dieses Chem-Pan-Sey ebenso wenig kontrollieren, wie Ihr einen Fluss rückwärts fließen lassen könnt. Worte können nicht immer Berge versetzen und Meere austrocknen. Manchmal ... muss man Gewalt anwenden."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in bastırdığı dudakları, ince bir çizgiye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Yazık oldu elantach. Nasıl ki bir nehrin tersine akmasını sağlayamazsan bu mon-keigh'in düşüncelerini de kontrol edemezsin. Her zaman sözlerle dağları yerinden oynatıp denizleri kurutamazsın. Bazen bunu... Sadece kılıçlar yapabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Alas, elantach. You cannot control the thoughts of this mon-keigh just as you cannot make a river flow backward. Words cannot always move the mountains and dry the seas. Sometimes... only blades can."
